title: Slab Serif
content:
Can you help me with this please?  
Make Stuff - and - REVOLUTION STAR NOW

[Preview](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417160644/http:/i1314.photobucket.com/albums/t566/e390781/wired_cover_zpsyqrxvhvv.jpg)
author: plax

comments.content:
|Make Stuff| is Vitesse Bold, by Hoefler & Co.:  
 [http://www.typography.com/fonts/vitesse/styles/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417160644/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/vitesse/styles/ "http://www.typography.com/fonts/vitesse/styles/")

|The DIY Revolution Starts Now| appears to be another Hoefler & Co. typeface, Forza Bold or Black:  
 [http://www.typography.com/fonts/forza/styles/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417160644/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/forza/styles/ "http://www.typography.com/fonts/forza/styles/")
